trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk Services Portal
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk Services Portal

trans-unit.source: <token>azure_1</token> has an <token>azportal</token> to create services, websites, databases, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <token>azure_1</token> has an <token>azportal</token> to create services, websites, databases, and so on.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> has its own portal - the <token>af_integration</token> portal.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> has its own portal - the <token>af_integration</token> portal.

trans-unit.source: To open the <token>af_integration</token> portal:
trans-unit.target: To open the <token>af_integration</token> portal:

trans-unit.source: In the <token>azportal</token> (<externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=213885</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=213885</linkUri></externalLink>), select your BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: In the <token>azportal</token> (<externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=213885</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=213885</linkUri></externalLink>), select your BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: In the task bar, select <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the task bar, select <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>af_integration</token> portal allows users to:
trans-unit.target: The <token>af_integration</token> portal allows users to:

trans-unit.source: Register your <token>af_integration</token> deployment
trans-unit.target: Register your <token>af_integration</token> deployment

trans-unit.source: Using the <token>azportal</token>, you create a BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: Using the <token>azportal</token>, you create a BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: When the BizTalk Service is created, you “register” your deployment in the <token>af_integration</token> portal.
trans-unit.target: When the BizTalk Service is created, you “register” your deployment in the <token>af_integration</token> portal.

trans-unit.source: The <token>af_integration</token> portal provides an easy and convenient user interface for all your <token>af_integration</token> applications.
trans-unit.target: The <token>af_integration</token> portal provides an easy and convenient user interface for all your <token>af_integration</token> applications.

trans-unit.source: You can also add users to share the management tasks of your <token>af_integration</token> deployments.
trans-unit.target: You can also add users to share the management tasks of your <token>af_integration</token> deployments.

trans-unit.source: Manage resources uploaded to the <token>af_integration</token> subscription
trans-unit.target: Manage resources uploaded to the <token>af_integration</token> subscription

trans-unit.source: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, you can:
trans-unit.target: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, you can:

trans-unit.source: Add/delete bridges, including bridges deployed from your project.
trans-unit.target: Add/delete bridges, including bridges deployed from your project.

trans-unit.source: Upload/delete schemas, transforms, assemblies, and certificates.
trans-unit.target: Upload/delete schemas, transforms, assemblies, and certificates.

trans-unit.source: View tracked messages, including active and completed batches.
trans-unit.target: View tracked messages, including active and completed batches.

trans-unit.source: Search for partners, agreements, and bridges that you deployed or added.
trans-unit.target: Search for partners, agreements, and bridges that you deployed or added.

trans-unit.source: Enable additional settings, like <legacyBold>Encryption at Rest</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Enable additional settings, like <legacyBold>Encryption at Rest</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Create and manage business-to-business (B2B) operations
trans-unit.target: Create and manage business-to-business (B2B) operations

trans-unit.source: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, you can easily manage and onboard trading partners for business-to-business messaging.
trans-unit.target: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, you can easily manage and onboard trading partners for business-to-business messaging.

trans-unit.source: With the <token>tpm_portal</token>, customers are able to cut down the on-boarding time from weeks to days.
trans-unit.target: With the <token>tpm_portal</token>, customers are able to cut down the on-boarding time from weeks to days.

trans-unit.source: You can also leverage Microsoft hosted B2B pipelines as services to exchange B2B documents and run them at scale for customers.
trans-unit.target: You can also leverage Microsoft hosted B2B pipelines as services to exchange B2B documents and run them at scale for customers.

trans-unit.source: This minimizes overhead in managing B2B pipelines and their corresponding scale issues with dedicated servers.
trans-unit.target: This minimizes overhead in managing B2B pipelines and their corresponding scale issues with dedicated servers.

trans-unit.source: To manage B2B operations using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, see <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>.
trans-unit.target: To manage B2B operations using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, see <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>.

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions on how to perform these tasks using the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions on how to perform these tasks using the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: In this Section
trans-unit.target: In this Section
